text: Tara jaba tiniharule, juna upadesa tinala'i di'i'eko thiyo tyasala'i birsidi'e, taba hamile tiniharuka lagi sabai dhokaharu kholidiyaum, yahamsam'ma ki jaba ti kuraharusita juna tinala'i di'i'eko thiyo, nikai prasanna bha'ihale taba hamile tinala'i ekaâ€“eka samatihalyaum ra tiniharu tyati bela nirasama dubihale
